trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a design host for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de tempo de design em um host de design para a classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> class is the base class for data source designers, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> classes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> classe é a classe base para designers de fonte de dados, como o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> classes.

trans-unit.source: If you create a new data source control, you might also want to create a custom control designer for your control and derive it from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Se você criar um novo controle de fonte de dados, você também poderá criar um designer personalizado de controle para o controle e derivá-la do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> class has two event methods: the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> classe tem dois métodos de evento: o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: Both of these events can be temporarily disabled with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A> method, which sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Os dois eventos podem ser desabilitados temporariamente com o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A> método, que define o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The event methods can be enabled again with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Os métodos de evento podem ser habilitados novamente com o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: There are two static methods that you can use to evaluate the equivalency of schemas or views without creating an instance of the class:
trans-unit.target: Há dois métodos estáticos que você pode usar para avaliar a equivalência de esquemas ou modos de exibição sem criar uma instância da classe:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemasEquivalent%2A> method compares two schemas.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemasEquivalent%2A> método compara dois esquemas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.ViewSchemasEquivalent%2A> method compares the schemas of two views.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.ViewSchemasEquivalent%2A> método compara os esquemas de dois modos de exibição.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use a custom data source control with several other small custom classes, as listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como usar um controle de fonte de dados personalizada com vários outros pequenos classes personalizadas, como listado na tabela a seguir.

trans-unit.source: Custom class
trans-unit.target: Classe personalizada

trans-unit.source: Derived from
trans-unit.target: Derivado de

trans-unit.source: `BookItem` (A two-field data structure.)
trans-unit.target: `BookItem` (Uma estrutura de dados do campo de dois).

trans-unit.source: After compiling the code example, open the .aspx page in Design view and then set the `DataSourceID` property to the ID of the custom data source control.
trans-unit.target: Depois de compilar o exemplo de código, abra a página. aspx no modo Design e, em seguida, defina o `DataSourceID` propriedade para a identificação do controle de fonte de dados personalizados.

trans-unit.source: To provide commands for the action list menu at design time in a derived class, you must override the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.ActionLists" /> property to return a custom <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> object with custom items that are derived from the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Para fornecer comandos no menu da lista de ação em tempo de design em uma classe derivada, você deve substituir o <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.ActionLists" /> propriedade para retornar um personalizado <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> objeto com itens personalizados que são derivados do <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.%23ctor%2A> constructor is called by the design host at design time.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.%23ctor%2A> construtor é chamado pelo host de design em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of items that are used to create an action list menu at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma lista de itens que são usados para criar um menu de lista de ações em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> object containing the action list items for the control designer.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> objeto que contém os itens da lista de ação para o designer de controle.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a simple composite control with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control, along with properties to set the `Text` properties on both internal controls, as well as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Width%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar um controle composto simple com um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> controle e um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> controle, juntamente com as propriedades para definir o `Text` propriedades em ambos os controles internos, bem como a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Width%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A> propriedades do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> controle.

trans-unit.source: An associated control designer class creates three <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> commands, each of which sets two properties on the control, and whose settings can be rolled back with the undo functionality in the design host.
trans-unit.target: Uma classe do designer de controle associado cria três <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> comandos, cada qual define duas propriedades no controle e cujas configurações podem ser revertidas com a funcionalidade de desfazer no host de design.

trans-unit.source: Although the code example does not use a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> object, it illustrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Embora o exemplo de código não usar um personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> do objeto, ele ilustra como substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.ActionLists%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: When you create a custom class that is derived from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner" /> class, you must override the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.ActionLists" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria uma classe personalizada que é derivado de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner" /> classe, você deve substituir o <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.ActionLists" /> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: In your override method, first call the base class to create the default <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> object, and then add a custom list of actions that are specific to your class.
trans-unit.target: O método de substituição, primeiro chame a classe base para criar o padrão <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> objeto e, em seguida, adicione uma lista personalizada de ações que são específicos para sua classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.Configure" /> method can be called.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.Configure" /> pode ser chamado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.Configure" /> can be called; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.Configure" /> pode ser chamado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A> property in a custom class to enable or disable design-time configuration for a specific data source.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A> propriedade em uma classe personalizada para habilitar ou desabilitar a configuração de tempo de design para uma fonte de dados específico.

trans-unit.source: A design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A> property to determine whether a command to configure the data source appears in the action list menu at design time.
trans-unit.target: Um host de design como [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] usa o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A> propriedade para determinar se um comando para configurar a fonte de dados é exibido no menu da lista de ações em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)" /> method can be called.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)" /> pode ser chamado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)" /> can be called; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)" /> pode ser chamado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> property in a derived class to enable or disable the ability to refresh the schema at design time for a specific data source.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> propriedade em uma classe derivada para habilitar ou desabilitar a capacidade de atualizar o esquema em tempo de design para uma fonte de dados específico.

trans-unit.source: If your application requires an invariant data structure and the schema will never change, you want the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> property to return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se seu aplicativo requer uma estrutura de dados constante e o esquema nunca será alterado, você quiser que o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> propriedade para retornar `false`.

trans-unit.source: A design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> property to determine whether a command to refresh the schema appears in the action list menu at design time.
trans-unit.target: Um host de design como [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] usa o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> propriedade para determinar se um comando para atualizar o esquema aparece no menu da lista de ações em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: In a design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], you can see the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> property in action by completing the following process:
trans-unit.target: Em um design de host, como [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], você pode ver o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> propriedade em ação Concluindo o processo a seguir:

trans-unit.source: On your page, place a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> or an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: Na página, coloque uma <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> ou um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> controle.

trans-unit.source: In Design view, on the action list, click **Configure**.
trans-unit.target: No modo de Design, na lista de ações, clique em **configurar**.

trans-unit.source: Remove a few fields from the data source.
trans-unit.target: Remova alguns campos da fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: On the action list, click **Refresh Schema**.
trans-unit.target: Na lista de ações, clique em **atualizar esquema**.

trans-unit.source: Launches the data source configuration utility in the design host.
trans-unit.target: Inicia o utilitário de configuração da fonte de dados no host de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A> method is not supported in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> class; however, it can be overridden by custom data source designers inheriting from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A> método não tem suporte no <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> classe; no entanto, ele pode ser substituído pelos designers de fonte de dados personalizado herdando de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> classe.

trans-unit.source: In a design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], you can see the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A> method in action by completing the following process:
trans-unit.target: Em um design de host, como [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], você pode ver o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A> método de ação ao concluir o processo a seguir:

trans-unit.source: Put a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> or an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> control on your page.
trans-unit.target: Colocar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> ou um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> controle em sua página.

trans-unit.source: In Design view, on the action list, clicking **Configure**.
trans-unit.target: No modo de Design, na lista de ações, clicando em **configurar**.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to invoke this method in the base class.
trans-unit.target: Tentativa de invocar esse método na classe base.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any property of the associated data source changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma propriedade da fonte de dados associada é alterada.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the HTML markup for displaying the associated data source control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Recupera a marcação HTML para exibir o controle de fonte de dados associado em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The markup for the design-time display.
trans-unit.target: A marcação para a exibição de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method returns the result from the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: A implementação padrão da <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método retorna o resultado da base de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: The name of the view.
trans-unit.target: O nome da exibição.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView" /> object that is identified by the view name.
trans-unit.target: Recupera um objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView" /> identificado pelo nome de exibição.

trans-unit.source: This implementation always returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Essa implementação sempre retorna <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: In derived classes, if `viewName` does not exist, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A> method should return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Em classes derivadas, se `viewName` não existir, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A> método deve retornar `null`.

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of the view names that are available in this data source.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma matriz dos nomes de exibição que estão disponíveis nessa fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: An array of view names.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de nomes de exibição.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object provided by the calling object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> fornecido pelo objeto de chamada.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged" /> event when the properties of the data source have changed and the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents" /> value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged" /> quando as propriedades da fonte de dados foram alteradas e o valor de <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents" /> é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method notifies the control designers of each control that is bound to the associated data source to refresh its control in the design host.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> método notifica os designers de controle de cada controle que está associado à fonte de dados associado ao atualizar seu controle no host de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method can be suppressed with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A> method or by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method with an argument of `false`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> método pode ser suprimido com o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A> método ou chamando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> método com um argumento de `false`.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed" /> event when the schema of the data source has changed and the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents" /> value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed" /> quando o esquema da fonte de dados foi alterado e o valor de <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents" /> é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> method notifies the control designers of each control that is bound to the associated data source that the fields in the schema have changed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> método notifica os designers de controle de cada controle que está associado à fonte de dados associados os campos no esquema foram alterados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> method can be suppressed with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A> method or by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> property with an argument of `false`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> método pode ser suprimido com o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A> método ou chamando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> propriedade com um argumento de `false`.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to allow events when refreshing the schema; <see langword="false" /> to disable the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged" /> and <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed" /> events when refreshing the schema.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para permitir eventos ao atualizar o esquema; <see langword="false" /> para desabilitar os eventos <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged" /> e <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed" /> ao atualizar o esquema.

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the schema from the data source, while optionally suppressing events.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza o esquema da fonte de dados, enquanto suprime eventos opcionalmente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method is not supported in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: O método <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> não é compatível com a classe <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: However, it is supported in derived classes, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, há suporte em classes derivadas, como o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> classe.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to invoke this method in the base class.
trans-unit.target: Tentativa de invocar esse método na classe base.

trans-unit.source: Restores data source events after the data source events have been suppressed.
trans-unit.target: Restaura os eventos de fonte de dados depois que os eventos de fonte de dados foram suprimidos.

trans-unit.source: Data source events can be suppressed by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents%2A> property to `false` or by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method with an argument of `true`.
trans-unit.target: Eventos de fonte de dados podem ser suprimidos definindo o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents%2A> propriedade `false` ou chamando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> método com um argumento de `true`.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to invoke this method in the base class.
trans-unit.target: Tentativa de invocar esse método na classe base.

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the schema has been refreshed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre depois que o esquema foi atualizado.

trans-unit.source: The first schema to compare (derived from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceSchema" />).
trans-unit.target: O primeiro esquema a ser comparado (derivado do <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceSchema" />).

trans-unit.source: The second schema to compare.
trans-unit.target: O segundo esquema a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: Provides a value that indicates whether two schemas are equal.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um valor que indica se dois esquemas são iguais.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if both schemas are equivalent; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se ambos os esquemas são equivalentes; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Comparison of the two schemas is based on the views, as well as the names and types of the fields that are contained in the views.
trans-unit.target: Comparação de dois esquemas baseia-se em modos de exibição, bem como os nomes e tipos dos campos que estão contidos nos modos de exibição.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemasEquivalent%2A> method can be used without an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemasEquivalent%2A> método pode ser usado sem uma instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> classe.

trans-unit.source: Postpones all data source events until after the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents" /> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Adia todos os eventos de fonte de dados até depois que o método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents" /> é chamado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged" /> event or the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)" /> method occurs.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged" /> ou o método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)" /> ocorre.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if events are being suppressed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se os eventos estão sendo suprimidos; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents%2A> property can be set by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method with an argument of `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents%2A> propriedade pode ser definida ao chamar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A> ou <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> método com um argumento de `true`.

trans-unit.source: The first view to compare (derived from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema" />).
trans-unit.target: A primeira exibição a ser comparada (derivada do <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema" />).

trans-unit.source: The second view to compare.
trans-unit.target: A segunda exibição a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: Provides a value that determines whether two schema views are equal.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um valor que determina se duas exibições de esquema são iguais.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if both views are equivalent; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se ambas as exibições são equivalentes; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.ViewSchemasEquivalent%2A> method can be used without an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.ViewSchemasEquivalent%2A> método pode ser usado sem uma instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> classe.
